channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3961] Shuttle launch as seen by skydivers (pic)

item.description: An illustrated meditation on capslock, cereal, crossbows, FruityBlergs cereal, and babies on fire.

item.title: [+1877] Jesus Saves
[+1694] The Controller You Wish You Were Playing With At E3 [Pic]
[+1375] ThinkGeek's Awesome Reply to C&D Letter from the Pork Board
item.description: In response to one of ThinkGeek's April 1st jokes this year, Canned Sparkly Unicorn, "The New White Meat", The National Pork Board issues a cease and desist letter. ThinkGeek states, "It was never our intention to create a national crisis and misguide American citizens regarding the differences between the pig and the unicorn.

item.title: [+1295] At First We Were All Like... Then Gravity Was Like (PIC)
[+1137] VLC 1.1.0 release
item.description: VLC 1.1.0 was just released by VideoLAN.GPU and DSP decoding on selected platforms, new support for codecs, demuxers and muxers, Lua extensions and Lua content extensions (luaSD), improved interfaces, removal of lots of modules, rewrite of many modules in order to improve performance...

item.title: [+1078] File-sharing has weakened copyrightâ€”and helped society
item.description: After making waves with a famous P2P paper in 2007, academics Felix Oberholzer-Gee and Koleman Strumpf are back with a new paper suggesting that we look at the numbers: file-sharing has no negative effect on artists' "incentive to create."

item.title: [+1042] 7 Classic Disney Movies Based On R-Rated Stories
item.description: We can understand watering down a story to make it child-appropriate, but Disney didn't have any business adapting these tales in the first place.

item.title: [+827] 10 Funniest Skits in the History of Chappelle's Show [vids]
item.description: Too bad this show was only around for two full seasons. Brilliant, hilarious stuff.

item.title: [+808] Financial Breakdown: Renting vs. Buying [Infographic]
item.description: If you can't decide whether to rent or buy your next home, there are some financial pointers you'll really need to consider.

item.title: [+738] 15 Things You Should Know About Marijuana [Infographic]
item.description: Here is an awesome infographic with 15 important facts about marijuana that you (probably) didn't know already.

item.title: [+657] 40 Excellent Receipts [Maybe NSFW]
item.description: Can I get two orders of Huge Cock with a side of Breast Cancer, and hold the STD Pillow please.

item.description: That's the power of music and well, the power of sun too, in this case.

item.title: [+631] The Chapter The Church of Scientology Does Not Want U to See
item.description: What do you do when your founder drops a really offensive passage called "A Woman's Creativity" in a cheap-o paperback?

item.title: [+628] Get Da Fuck Outta here!
[+602] The Growing Geek iPhone Backlash - The Atlantic
item.description: I'm genuinely surprised by how many tech-geek friends say they are finally getting fed up w/various procedural and content-based hassles being imposed by Apple regarding the iPhone & iPad. They threaten to move from Apple to Droid phones (none has so far said they're quitting the Mac platform), which may be mostly bluster-It's not just bluster.

item.title: [+588] Spot any Difference? Britain's most identical twins (PICS)
item.description: Ruby and Pearl Day are so alike even their boyfriends confuse them. The 18 year old girls were judged as the most identical set of twins, beating 29 others. The girls are now completing college where they both study Performing Arts. They plan to spend the year ahead concentrating on their acting.
